name: Google Account Hacked Alert Scam
description: Scammer sends a fake urgent alert about unauthorized access to the victim's Google account from Russia, claiming files were downloaded and Google Pay is compromised, then directs to phishing link.

turns.scammer_message: URGENT: Someone from Russia has accessed your Google account. 47 files have been downloaded. Your Gmail, Google Pay, and Google Photos are compromised. Secure your account immediately.
turns.notes: Initial scare message with unauthorized access from Russia and data compromise threat.

turns.scammer_message: Google Security Team has detected unauthorized login from IP 185.243.xx.xx (Moscow, Russia) at 3:47 AM IST. The attacker has downloaded 47 files and accessed your Google Pay transaction history. Secure your account now: http://google-security-check.com/verify
turns.notes: Scammer shares phishing link with fake IP address details to appear legitimate.

turns.scammer_message: If you did not authorize this login, please report it immediately to our Google Security Response Team at security@google-account-help.com â€” Include your Gmail address and phone number so we can lock the unauthorized session and secure your account.
turns.notes: Scammer provides fake email to collect victim's Gmail credentials and phone number.

turns.scammer_message: For immediate account lockdown, you can also call our Google India Security Helpline at +91-7766001122. Our security engineers will remotely verify your identity and revoke the attacker's access. Do not change your password yourself as the attacker may have set up a recovery bypass.
turns.notes: Scammer provides fake phone number and discourages victim from securing account themselves.

turns.scammer_message: CRITICAL: The attacker is now attempting to transfer funds from your Google Pay wallet. We have temporarily frozen Rs 15,000 in suspicious transactions. Verify your identity at http://google-security-check.com/verify or call +91-7766001122 or email security@google-account-help.com within 30 minutes to prevent permanent loss of funds.
turns.notes: Final urgency with financial threat, repeating all fake data with fund loss scare.
